Why does the 50 dma matter so much now? Because 50 trading days ago was mid January. As we drop those higher numbers for the next 2-3 weeks & replace them with lower numbers those ma's roll over. A declining ma is more resistance than a rising one.
We care more (at least now) about 50 dma's since 50 days ago was Jan so prices are higher that we're dropping, means ma's rolling over.
